section.title: Accessing the IEclipseContext from 3.x API
section.para: The Eclipse 4.x IDE uses the IEclipseContext data structure to store central information about the IDE. You can access this information also via the Eclipse 3.x API. This approach is demonstrated with the following snippets. These code snippets assume that you are familiar with the 3.x API, if that is not the case you can skip this section.
